name: 寂寞星球
lyrics: 【intro】
已經幾點鐘我還在外面玩的瘋

【chrous】
憋的太久 總悶的太過

【chorus】
【verse】
I hate that voices but I can't be chose
Like I hate fake friends but I need to chat
I don't wanna be who you wanna be
Running my businesses not your businesses
這裡沒你的位 太多敷衍在堆
對我盡情看扁 對我記心裡面
Maybe out of your range
So you think I'm crazy
【chorus】

name: 挨粄歌
lyrics: 挨礱披波 打粄唱歌  姐婆來到 嗄無凳坐
一坐坐著溶雞膏
粄姊 亻厓愛挨粄囉
屋下浸米愛打粄 粄袋帶等尋粄姊
挨好粄來石頭矺 挨粄矺燥燙粄嫲
粄嫲亼粄挼粄圓 竹篩粄帕張粄圓
粄圓粄圓一篩篩 蔥頭香菇噼蝦仁
老薑烏糖牛汶水 客家粄圓有鹹又有甜
愛鹹也愛甜 來到客莊在你選
挨礱披波 打粄唱歌 兜凳人客坐 食粄聽唱歌
歸攏波落 相湊聽歌 有凳斯來坐 坐等等聽歌
粄姊 我要挨粄囉
屋裡浸泡米要打粄 粄袋帶著去找粄姊
挨好粄之後石頭壓著 挨粄壓乾再剝一些來燙粄母
粄母搓進壓乾的粄開始斷粄揉湯圓 竹篩子粄帕裝著湯圓
湯圓一整篩滿滿都是 再來炒蔥頭香菇蝦仁一起爆香
老薑黑糖牛汶水 客家湯圓有鹹有甜
要鹹還是要甜 來到客家庄任你選
螳螂(挨礱披波) 打粄唱歌 拿板凳給客人坐 食粄聽唱歌
一群人聚在一起 相找來聽歌 有板凳就來坐 坐著等聽歌

name: 細妹出嫁
lyrics: 田莊細妹愛嫁咧 嫁哪位 嫁山背
紙炮併鈴砰朗來迎親 扛轎阿哥有交待
坐在轎肚 上崎愛凴等 下崎愛箭等
渡路雞在頭前 媒人婆搖啊搖啊搖
客家八音跈等行 鏗鏗鏘鏘咿歐歪
八仙綵掛門楣 粢粑醃缸裝 米糕歸籮䈪 準備請人客
媒人婆講四句 新婚喜新婚 福祿滿乾坤 夫妻相和好 百子傳千孫
田庄的小妹要出嫁囉 嫁哪裡呢 嫁大山背
放鞭砲並令砰浪作響來迎親 扛轎的阿哥有交待說
坐在轎子裡面 上坡要靠著 下坡腳要蹬著
帶路雞在前面 媒人婆搖阿搖的走
客家八音跟著一起走 鏗鏗鏘鏘咿歐歪
八仙綵掛在門楣上 麻糬裝在缸裡面 米糕放一整籮筐 準備請客人
媒人婆說四句好話 新婚喜新婚 福祿滿乾坤 夫妻相合好 百子傳千孫

name: 竹仔
lyrics: 講著竹仔會想著哪位 係新竹還係竹東  講著竹仔會想著麼个 係筍乾還係籮䈪

斯去河壩脣个竹垺下取竹仔做嗶哱笐  斯去山林肚个竹林下尋嫩筍 捉筍蛄

山裡是否還找得到筍蛄  紙寮窩裡也只剩 古物擺來看而已了

name: 曾仲瑋
lyrics: 今晡日一打早亻厓斯毋想上班 今晡日當晝頭亻厓乜毋想上班

name: 仙哥仔

os 阿婆講什麼呢

name: 旅客
lyrics: 係無火車 仰般去旅行摎心打開 你講个地圖 用紅色鉛筆圈起來詳細看
斯在該一隻 遊樂園个人潮門外 背景 在該捩捩轉
行來行去 敢係無忒又有想忒多 所以 妳講个路線 亻厓做得跈等車票行斯歡喜咧
這擺旅行 一開始你斯無共下行 緊行 你像在脣口
看著該方向 馬上斯轉彎
無妳在這 錯過摎行過全共樣 逐步亻厓斯有特別安排 旅客行過新風景莫隨來隨走
毋過相片 裡背有忒少人忒多空間 係毋係會少忒 妳正看得著个精采个所在

看見有方向 立刻就轉彎

可是照片 裡面有太少肩膀太多空白 是不是會少了 你眼睛才看得見的精采 的地帶
腳步輕鬆 還是先直走然後轉彎 對照 你說的地圖 我都找到了最美麗的依賴
有人貪光景 有人為愛情 我們繞一圈走回來 旅客是我 而你不在

lyrics: 電影 大三元 主題曲

name: Wolves
lyrics: Hinges creak, they can't take much more,
Wood it splinters, I hear them at the walls,
I hold you close, while you shake in fear,
As our last few moments draw near.
Lord lend me courage in this fight to come,
And steel my heart when we're overrun,
Even though our only hope's forlorn,
Lord send me the bravery to go on.
As wolves and daemons pound against our door,
We stoke these flames in readiness for this war,
It's love, this is love,
Love, this is love we are fighting for,
It's love, yes it's love,
Love, this is love, it's worth dying for.
You start to scream as hands come through the floor;
My heart sinks as they break in through the walls;
I'm so scared that I can hardly breathe,
The darkness surrounds us as they pull your hands from me.
And as the flames grow, the flames grow, the flames grow higher,
Our last chance, our last hope, we jump into the fire…

name: Wind in the Pines
lyrics: Amongst the pine cones,
I tugged my coat closed,
and I tried in vain to get some sleep,
But the howling winds,
they blew through the trees,
and they robbed all chance of slumber from me.
So I carried my love to the mountain top,
and I buried her where angels come to die,
How the heavens wept,
cried their heavy tears,
against a cold steel grey and barren sky.
Wohohoh is there anything left of me?
Wohohoh is there anything left of me…
without you?
I laid down by your graveside,
and I finally slept a hundred stolen years,
But when I awoke,
I found my face was covered,
by a river of ten thousand frozen tears.
The photographs we took,
faded, and strewn across the dusty floor.
The marks we left growing up,
Now just forgotten stains,
remembered only by those rotting walls.

name: Rotting
lyrics: I've been shielding my possessions from the ever-pouring rain,
God damn these city streets, I've been worn-down in their grain,
I've been chasing warm magenta in this world so colourless,
I've been taking in the graces of your complete incompleteness.
And somewhere in the darkness, there's a small glow,
Blow the embers darling watch this flame grow,
We'll raze their hopes and dreams to the ground,
Let's burn these castles down.
I've been sitting lonely on the roof, the rain has been tumbling down,
Hear the rolling thunder rumbling way off over town,
I've been sitting slowly rotting from the wet in this sodden air,
Never able to get dry, I'm stuck fast, I'm going nowhere.
I was taking my possessions from the old ladies next door,
In the twilight of their winter years, they don't need them much no more,
I've been closer, closer to the edge, it's been brinkmanship at its best,
I've given them everything I've got, but they've given me fuck all back.

name: Translation
lyrics: Sometimes we both get confused,
Thoughts conveyed, misunderstood,
A little loss in translation,
Mutates into petty petty confrontation,
Sometimes I'm misunderstood,
What you hear is not what you should
Translation, when it breaks down,
Leads us into these petty petty rows.
Sometimes you drive me insane,
A quick temper, alien ways,
But I'd rather fight with you
than make love to another woman any day.
I do, I love you, more and more every day,
I do, I serve you, in every step I take,
I do, I speak you, in every word I say,
Yes it's true, I love you…
More and more every day
Sometimes you're misunderstood,
My ears just don't hear what they should,
Is this merely a culture clash?
Or some more fundamental mismatch?
All these petty things,
All these little things,
They mean nothing…
To me

name: Hold On
lyrics: Hold on,
This life isn't easy,
It keeps taking from me,
It's eating me from within.
Hold on,
Time moves so slowly,
but you're dying swiftly,
It's eating you from within.
我相信你  我信任你
Have a little faith,
Have a little heart,
Take a little pride,
In what you've done
Take a little time,
Take a little breath,
Don't fear what lies within,
Then you'll fly, just step right in….
Hold on,
I am so empty,
Your words whispered to me,
I'm bleeding as you speak.
And if it all starts to fall apart,
Well don't fear,
For all that is lost, can be found.

name: Crumbling Bones
lyrics: Big bully boy, twice my weight and size,
Used to come on over and steal my lunch sometimes,
But I stood by
and let him take what was mine…
I've always been smaller than the rest,
And as for fighting? Second rate at best,
But just one time, I stood up for myself,
and big bully boy beat me half to death.
And since that day, I forget many things,
But no, no not you, my heart will always sing.
And sometimes I forget everyone,
But no, no not you, you have my heart won,
You are part of me.
And Oh…
Unforgettable, you are part of me,
Unforgettable, you are part of me.
And I will remember you
when I'm crumbling bones,
And I will remember you
when we're crumbling bones.

name: Perfect Day
lyrics: Here in the car, driving for miles,
Yeah, we'll take in the sights,
we'll reminisce,
right the world,
Yeah, we'll shoot the shit,
Share in old times... while there's still time,
Here in the car, just riding round,
Yeah, we're just hanging out,
messing about,
laughing out loud,
All of the way, it's been a perfect day.
Right before you go,
I just want to say it loud, say it clear,
say it for this damn world to hear,
That I thank you
Wohohohoh,
It's been a perfect day
And right before you went,
I hope this message sent,
That it was loud, that it was true,
I'll always love you…
All of the time…
It's been a perfect day.

name: Rag and Bone World
lyrics: Well, you can make mistakes,
I will take the fall,
There's nothing here for breakfast,
but we're never truly poor,
We're fighting together,
Here in this rag and bone world.
Well nothing here is stable,
Everything falls,
But you got to take these bright lights
with these curtain calls,
We're scraping a living,
Here in this rock and roll world.
Oh Rebel Heart, you sing to me, give strength to me,
Oh Rebel Heart, won't you sing to me?
You strengthen me through sound.
Well looking 'round this small room,
the walls are green with mould,
Everything here is broken, nothing works as it should,
We're quickly getting thinner,
Starving in this rag and bone world.
And I promise, it won't stay like this,
'cos I can see we're moving forward
slowly in this rag and bone world.

name: Paperman
lyrics: You're just the paper man, you're yesterday's news,
You're full of stories, not one of them is true;
Oh don't forget about all of my worries or my strife,
You'll bear in mind all that was done wrong,
but nothing that was right;
Words red ruby, cut right through me,
Paper ships sail on scarlet tides,
I can't run and I can't hide, sinking in plain sight,
Your words cut me now....
they crush me now...
they weigh me down...
Just the paper man, my fingers are black from your filth,
Your hands are stained red, blood money pays your bills;
Oh don't forget about all of your money or your pride,
I'll bear in mind all that you've done wrong,
You've never done what was right;
Oh sticks and stones may break my bones,
but the weight of your words has drowned me.
Yeah, they weigh me down, Yeah, they cross my bows,
Under the weight of your words,
I sink down,
down,
down,
down,
down…..

name: Silently Violently
lyrics: Time whispers so softly,
On still waters you drift to me,
Winds blow so gently,
Your little boat sails on toward me,
Oh, I love you,
This is love.
I wait so quietly,
Not a sound will come from me,
But time moved so swiftly,
Oh, the currents, they dragged you from me.
Oh, I loved you,
This was love,
And so silently, violently,
You were ripped from me,
Oh so silently, violently,
How I long for thee,
This is love, it's still love.
Oh, I love you,
This is love.

每一種都美，每一種都有它們的獨一無二。
每一刻都朦朧，每一刻都恍惚得明哲。
每一件都清晰，每一件都清醒得不徹底。
若是失散了，就會孤獨，若是相聚了，就會轉變。
不可思議！
不可思愚！

name: 中離
lyrics: 因看穿生活是一場，

竟在不知不覺中，就親近了靈魂，

誰教我愛上，一個中離者，
誰教我愛上，一個中離者。

lyrics: (哎) 在這爛漫雨中，我覺得不是說，

沒有不能夠，想問就得先接受。

你和我；是男是女回憶全抹。
無邊際，遺產沙漠，

奢侈帶點微落寞，
在父母心中串流，悠遊壯闊。
隨意誰都能有當過我；
隨意誰都能有當過我。

name: 高熱
lyrics: 短暫的夏天，
魯莽的發情，毀了一個人、毀了兩個人。
錯誤的冀盼，
荒唐的優雅！揮一揮不見、心裡頭不忘。
'需要一個理由忘了你的臉，
不再隨時隨地浮現到我心田；
聽你說最近生活得比較閒，
還不知為什麼想再見你一面⋯⋯'
熱浪把我的理智融化變成一盆沙；

上擺下盪、左搖右晃。
高溫把我的感情白熱，
但是卻沒能照亮，我的陰暗。
我站在火山洞裡的岩漿上，
屍骨太寒冷！
感冒⋯⋯我感冒。
Summer Loving.
Summer Loving, Summer! Summer!
Summer Loving, Summer Loving…
Summer! Summer!
Summer Loving, Summer! Summer!
Summer Loving, Summer…
'我不要笑著，你也只是想玩場遊戲。
也不要感動，就當我們正只能透明；
我想你休憩，像一架噴射機的引擎。
隨時準備帶我遠行，重溫高熱真趣⋯⋯'

你不成全我。

lyrics: 日記來不及寫 歲數已到了知命之年

name: Ordinary People
lyrics: We are ordinary people
Living ordinary lives in our own different ways

Every wound every pain there's no shame
It's OK to cry there's no need to hide, that's where change takes place.
We are ordinary people
Living ordinary lives in our own different ways

Every wall every bridge that we built
In the midst of all this we fail to see that we're all the same

It's motivation that pushes us forward
It's passion that keeps that fire burning
But it's love, it's love that gives life meaning.
We Just have to be willing to feel,
Every wound every pain there's no shame
It's OK to cry there's no need to hide,
But it's love, it's love that gives life meaning.

But most importantly I'm his daughter.
Life is an endless journey,
OH it feels so good to have You around,
Knowing that I'm not alone.
I'm not alone…

these journeys that brought us all together

so let our imaginations takes us

Life's an endless journey,
Oh it feels so good to have You around, knowing that we're not alone.
We're not alone…

name: 不想放開
lyrics: Feat. 文慧如
在社會上 那是一群不務正業晃蕩的小丑

一路上多少辛酸艱苦 多少孤獨
這是條崎嶇不平 漫長未知的旅途
看同學都已名成立就 多次的無地自容
但對不起我還沒有打算認輸
不想放開 不想離開
再大阻礙 再多眼淚 再痛的傷害
不想放開 不需要誰來記載
也許現在 也許未來 只剩一片空白
這是個無價的消耗品 在這裡
沒有人能體諒尊重它背後的用心 和努力
在揚名立萬以前 會被撻伐 被貶低
付出的心血和時間 換來的從來不成正比
你 聽他說大道理 告訴你手頭很緊
揮霍著名車和現金 然後苦著殺價討便宜
明明他需要你 卻裝作毫不在意
殘酷的社會 尊嚴都被踐踏在腳底
多少委屈收在心裡 熬過去
日以繼夜一點一滴累積 在堆砌
偶爾回到了家裡 還得故作堅強韌性
最害怕掩不住的淚水 出賣了自己
無所遁形 爸爸媽媽 我對不起
不想放開 不想離開
再大阻礙 再多眼淚 再痛的傷害
不想放開 不需要誰來記載
也許現在 也許未來 只剩一片空白
Oh~ yeah~
也許會期待 也許是悲哀
始終不願放開 喔
我會一直都在
我不知道哪一天 才能走到終點
也不知道還需要多久的時間去試煉
當有一天我擱淺 安靜地閉上雙眼
沉淪在這世界 某個角落 讓自己淪陷
我沒有資格埋怨 也不須同情可憐
自己的選擇要自己負責 沒有任何抱歉
我只能勇往直前 哪怕再大的風險
為了夢想能實現決意拋頭顱灑熱血
我灑熱血

name: Sound The Alarm
lyrics: Bugle on the song
(號角)
Luney Tunez
(盧尼 突尼茨)
Jackson Turner
(傑克遜 特納)
Who used to think I'm insane?
是誰曾經以為我瘋了?
From the gully to the plane
從平民窟到飛機上
When they see me mister Thompson
當他們看到湯普森先生
Now they call me thats my name
現在他們稱那是我的名字
Home of the predator
捕食者的家
Living hard, always competitive, focus ahead of you
努力工作，始終保持競爭力，專注於你自己
Its incredible
這令人難以置信
Take your thought to a whole different level, up over the pedestal
將你的思想帶到一個完全不同的層面，直到變成信仰

Holding the flag up like Moses

With Bedouin tribes straight out of the desert

Every second is treacherous

If you mess up it could be the death of you

Every step that you take is road of its own

Till your flesh and bones are weathering

In the dead of the night, we go head up and fight with the metal grip

Been through tribulation, yes we've been through storms

Been through tribulation, yes we've been through storms

And now the king is here, the champ is here

Feed the adrenaline

Let it rush, deep in your inner core

Through meridian lines

Intricate miles of energy piled up under your spine

We been on the grind

Ring the alarm and give me your diamonds

name: Light It Up
lyrics: You make me feel like I'm floating above the world
你讓我感覺到我正浮於塵世
Just overdosed on endorphins on purpose
就像服用了過量的內啡肽
Beyond the surface, underneath all of your hurtful words are you virtues
透過表面，在你所有傷害的話語下面是你的美德
Even your perfume giving me urges
你的香水味讓我衝動
I feel it inside of my nerves, hot as furnace
我感到內心深處，像火爐一樣滾燙
Tired of all of these words that we just regurgitate with no purpose
我厭倦了我們之間毫無目的重複話語
Speak to me girl, is it worth it? I see the inertia
女孩，跟我說話吧，我們這樣生活值得的嗎？我瞭解習慣的力量
Even with all of your blemishes you were still perfect
即使你有瑕疵，但你仍就完美
I took it the furthest that I could have ever endured
我把它帶到了我能忍受的最遠的地方
Now its your turn to reverse it
現在輪到你了
Oh my Lord, I was in love with you with all my heart
噢，天呐，我全心全意地愛著你
You've already broken me
你卻讓我心碎不已
We both got scars
我們的心都曾受傷
I'm over the edge and still I want more
我已經走過邊緣，但我卻想要更多
So please don't let me fall
所以請不要讓我跌倒
I'm on the edge of our love, trying to hold on
我處於愛的邊緣，並努力堅持下去
Would you catch me if I fall or let me go?
如果我跌倒了，你會把我扶起來或者讓我走嗎？
I'm on the edge of our love
我處於我們愛的邊緣
I'm dangling on, hanging by the hope of your light
我晃來晃去，依賴著你的光明帶給我的希望

I don't know what the truth is, I must be foolish

Somebody told me that love is illusive

Got nothing to prove, stuck in your groove all covered with goose bumps

name: Let Me Clear My Throat
lyrics: No fear, light up that fire

猶如7月4日
Throw your torches up higher
將你的火炬拋向更高處

讓我清一清喉嚨！

Vocabulary pulled out of my gall bladder
歌詞從我的胸腔中奔湧而出
I box Hamilton, joust with John Adams
我擊敗漢密爾頓，我要與約翰·亞當斯並肩而戰

所有這些小朋克式的說唱歌手

如果他們有一半是卡戴珊家族的，還不會過這個說唱考試

我看到饑餓的人群在增加
Underneath they smiles, be advised
在他們的微笑之下，請注意

Little killers walk with nine millimeters, still in PS

name: Wolves
lyrics: 盲目，我一個人爭取，沒有人幫助
Blind, alone I struggle, with no one to help
在長途的線路，發展的天賦，被擋住
Upon the long journey, the development of my talent gets blocked
飛躍巔峰，因為劍士Saber和我不會失敗，禁用帶電的保險絲
aim for the top cause Saber and I will not lose, disable the live fuse
像牛一樣強壯，像颱風一樣強大
strong as an ox, enormous as typhoons
從來不讓步
Never give in
擺脫，出賣過自己的太多, 心灰意冷的生活
Please! Too many have sold out, living meaningless lives
如果你想要戰爭，請進行正面反抗
kick in the front door, if you want war
別軟弱
don't be weak
心裡不踏實，但是不怕事
My heart is unstable, but still I'm scared of nothing
即使是不可能的任務也無法難倒我們
even mission impossible is not positioned to stop us

I promise. You cannot see the value of hip-hop; our lofty ideals
說話像Nas，饒舌容易掉牙齒
I speak like Nas, rapping so fast I might loose teeth

then finish them off with nitroglycerin lava

Straight fire!

its cosmic musical vibration

keep doing that real sh*t

name: Highest Heights
lyrics: I'd give it all for us
我會為了我們全力以赴
However much it costs, wouldn't cost too much
即使付出多少代價也在所不惜
No matter scars or cuts
無論是傷疤還是傷口
You are the only one for me, oddly enough
你對我而言就是我的唯一
Let me open up your heart to a broader love, baby
寶貝，讓我打開你的心扉，釋放更廣闊的愛
If you're strong enough
如果你足夠強大
I wanna show you that I'm worth your trust
我想證明，我值得你的信任
I'm not the person that you thought I was
我不是你認為的那種人
I'm more than just a man trying to get inside your pants
我不是那種只想進入你身體的那類人
I know you're scared
我知道你很害怕
I see beyond that mask that you always wear
我看到的不只是戴著面具的你
All the wounds up under there, the beauty of the secrets you don't want to share
那裡的所有傷口，是你不想分享的秘密美麗
I come to heal
讓我來治癒你
I love the way you hug me, its something real
我喜歡你擁抱我的方式，它是如此真實的東西
I guess its just the comfort of a mother's care
我想這只是母親般的照顧
And when I try to peel away another layer of you, suddenly your deepness I become aware
當我試圖剝下你的一層面具，我突然注意到了你的內心深處
For me its always brighter on a summer day
對我來說，夏日總是更加明亮
You spent your whole life running away, now I want you to stay
你一生都在逃避，現在我希望你留下來
So hold me on this lonely night
所以在這個寂寞的夜晚抱緊我
I feel I've known you all my life
我覺得你我已相識一生
Its like a roller coaster ride
就像坐過山車一樣
To the highest heights
達到最高之巔
And if you ask, I know not why
